name: Virtual Mouse simulator
description:
Are you ready for the challenging rat warrior simulator games? Then must play rat simulator: survival 2018 games to experience a different style of 2018 games. Rat simulator: Survival 2018 is not animal hunting game, Jurassic Zoo survival, wild jungle animals or gorilla animal survival games and wild dog survival games. It is unique rat simulator game: survival 2018 game which is based on the survival missions in dark jungle. You are playing as rat and you have to survive in the jungle by fighting with other wild animals by killing them, don’t forget to collect your reward to live a long life in this dark jungle. Don’t wait anymore and get ready for this challenging rat simulator: survival 2018 game.

You are on the real adventure of animal games of rat simulator by killing wild Jurassic animals in the safari jungle. Now you get the chance to win by killing anaconda and Rabbits in the wild jungle. Come play this unique Super animal Simulators or rat simulator. We have created a huge open world game with many places to explore, loads of animals, and plenty of challenges. Find the Crocodile Den, the Bear Cave, the Horse Sanctuary, and the Bat Cave. The goal is to find your warrior mouse friend and then start brutal fight against wild animals. Start this ultimate game of rat survival now! Thrive and survive as you take on all the challenges of a huge forest map.

Experience the best animations with awesome high quality graphics and great sound effects. Be the best mouse warrior in the dark jungle to kill the other wild animals.

Features for Rat Simulator: Survival 2018
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Beautiful environment
- Realistic animals
- Best powers to kill wild animals
- Awesome mouse survival missions
- Challenging hunting levels

Download it now for free!
